thread.section_title: Le 123 Sebastopol - Astotel - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Hotel
thread.title_full: Great Hotel - Review of Le 123 Sebastopol - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Chander K
title: Great Hotel
text: Stayed here last weekend, the hotel is a cinematic venue, the reception is like a cinema ticket counter with cinema lights and items all over the place, really different and great. Rooms are modern and again individually decorated, there might be the same on each floor, but have spoken to other people who were staying there at the same time and they had different themed rooms.Has the usual fitness stuff, never used so cannot comment. Had included breakfast which was a buffet, good breakfast and filling.
